Inventory of the books in the Harlan James Smith collection at the McDonald Observatory, Fort Davis, Texas. Harlan was the directory of the observatory from 1963 to 1989. He died in 1991. Upon his death his widow Joan, donated some of his books to the observatory. A second donation occurred in Nov 2021. All books have a Ex Libris plate of HJS usually on inside of the front cover unless otherwise noted in the comments.
entry 90-104 should follow entry 130
started 1 Dec 2021, finished 23 Oct 2022, proofread
This is the catalogue for the first mailing from the Harlan J Smith library. These books were held over by Joan Smith and were sent to myself and the McDonald library by Nat Smith when Joan wanted to downsize. They were sent in four boxes to myself on 2 Nov 2021. They sat in the McDonald Library for a number of months before I took them home in April 2022 in order to catalogue them. I began cataloguing this set on 10 April 2022 and finished on 11 April 2022 The documents the first three boxes of books in the second shipment from the Harlan J. Smith estate. I received these books on 29 March 2022 from Jeffrey Mallon. Catalogued these books 9-10 April 2022. This file is for the third mailing of Harlan Smith's library to McDonald observatory. They were received by Jim Fowler on 13 April 2022. There were two 1 cubic foot boxes and one 1/2 cubic foot box. I did the cataloguing on 16-17 April 2022.
